FIELD.NAME: contextid
FIELD.COMMENT: Context ID this broadcast applies to. Messages will get sent to this context and its children

FIELD.NAME: loggedin
FIELD.COMMENT: If true then this broadcast message will only be sent to users who were logged in at the time of broadcast creation.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: The time the broadcast was created

FIELD.NAME: timeend
FIELD.COMMENT: The time the broadcast message ends (expires).

TABLE.NAME: tool_broadcast_users
TABLE.COMMENT: Table stores user details of who has acknowledged messages

FIELD.NAME: broadcastid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the broadcast message that relates to this user

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the user who acknowledged the message

FIELD.NAME: contextid
FIELD.COMMENT: The context ID the user was in when they acknowledged the message

FIELD.NAME: acktime
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp when the user acknowledged the message.
